Package nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.util

@NonNullByDefault package nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.util
Provides utility classes that depend on the Spigot API and can be used by all modules for the Spigot platform.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.util.api
    Contains various APIs used by BigDoorsSpigot that need to be implemented by a sub-platform.
    nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.util.implementations
    Provides implementations of BigDoors core interfaces that can be used by all modules for the Spigot platform.
    nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.util.text
    Provides utility classes and Text implementations that depend on the Spigot API and can be used by all modules for the Spigot platform.

    Class
    Description
    SpigotAdapter
     
    SpigotUtil
    Represents various small and Spigot-specific utility functions.
